attributes.action: Reinstate Sam Allardyce as England manager
attributes.additional_details:
Are we going to allow the English press to once again hound out of office an England manager? To be the manager of our national side carries weight and maybe we should expect a certain level of behaviour yes, but this is England and shouldn't we allow for one mistake? 

Let this petition be the decider, vote for big Sam to be reinstated.
attributes.background: Sam was employed to make great decisions on the pitch, should he and the English people be denied our best chance at glory on the pitch because of a poor decision off the pitch?
